summary:
### Summary of ASX Announcement (Exploration Update)  

- **RC Drilling Program Commenced**: 17-hole, 1,600m program at Mulgabbie North's Cross Fault Gold Discovery.  
- **Objective**: Expand high-grade gold mineralisation along strike and at depth.  
- **Previous High-Grade Results**:  
  - 48m @ 1.66 g/t Au (incl. 9m @ 5.79 g/t Au).  
  - 12m @ 4.26 g/t Au (incl. 2m @ 22.58 g/t Au).  
- **Geological Context**: Targets sandstone-hosted mineralisation, analogous to nearby Carosue Dam deposits.  
- **Assay Timing**: Delays expected (2–6 weeks) due to lab prioritisation of mine samples.  

**No material capital markets or trading-impacting updates identified.** (Operational focus only.)
